snippet: Testing on an unmanned aircraft system started on Monday in Alaska, one of six states selected for such testing, the Federal Aviation Administration said.
lead_paragraph: Testing on an unmanned aircraft system started on Monday in Alaska, one of six states selected for such testing, the Federal Aviation Administration said.

headline.main: Alaska: Testing Begins on Drone Use for Animal Census
headline.print_headline: Alaska: Testing Begins On Drone Use For Animal Census
